verses.verse: וַיָּ֡קָם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kom rose up אֶלְיָשִׁיב֩ <S%H475><s%> 'el-ya-Shiv Then Eliashib הַכֹּהֵ֨ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּד֜וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol the high וְאֶחָ֣יו <S%H251><s%> ve-'e-Chav with his brethren הַכֹּהֲנִ֗ים <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-ha-Nim, the priests וַיִּבְנוּ֙ <S%H1129><s%> vai-yiv-Nu and they builded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar gate הַצֹּ֔אן <S%H6629><s%> hatz-Tzon, the sheep הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they קִדְּשׁ֔וּהוּ <S%H6942><s%> kid-de-Shu-hu, they sanctified וַֽיַּעֲמִ֖ידוּ <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'a-Mi-du it and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֑יו <S%H1817><s%> dal-to-Tav; the doors וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> ve-'ad- against מִגְדַּ֤ל <S%H4026><s%> mig-Dal of it even unto the tower הַמֵּאָה֙ <S%H3968><s%> ham-me-'Ah of Meah קִדְּשׁ֔וּהוּ <S%H6942><s%> kid-de-Shu-hu, they sanctified עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against מִגְדַּ֥ל <S%H4026><s%> mig-Dal it unto the tower חֲנַנְאֵֽל׃ <S%H2606><s%> cha-nan-'El. of Hananeel ס sa-Mek

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and יָד֥וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do And next unto him בָנ֖וּ <S%H1129><s%> va-Nu builded אַנְשֵׁ֣י <S%H582><s%> 'an-Shei the men יְרֵח֑וֹ <S%H3405><s%> ye-re-Cho; of Jericho ס sa-Mek וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and יָד֣וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do Next בָנָ֔ה <S%H1129><s%> va-Nah, And next to them builded זַכּ֖וּר <S%H2139><s%> zak-Kur Zaccur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אִמְרִֽי׃ <S%H566><s%> 'im-Ri. of Imri ס sa-Mek

וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar gate הַדָּגִ֔ים <S%H1709><s%> had-da-Gim, But the fish בָּנ֖וּ <S%H1129><s%> ba-Nu build בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei did the sons הַסְּנָאָ֑ה <S%H5570><s%> has-se-na-'Ah; of Hassenaah הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they קֵר֔וּהוּ <S%H7136><s%> ke-Ru-hu, who [also] laid the beams וַֽיַּעֲמִ֙ידוּ֙ <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'a-Mi-du thereof and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <S%H1817><s%> dal-to-Tav, the doors מַנְעוּלָ֖יו <S%H4514><s%> man-'u-Lav thereof the locks וּבְרִיחָֽיו׃ <S%H1280><s%> u-ve-ri-Chav. thereof and the bars ס sa-Mek

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and יָדָ֣ם <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dam And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֗יק <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zik, repaired מְרֵמ֤וֹת <S%H4822><s%> me-re-Mot Meremoth בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אוּרִיָּה֙ <S%H223><s%> 'u-ri-Yah of Urijah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son הַקּ֔וֹץ <S%H6976><s%> hak-Kotz, of Koz ס sa-Mek וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and יָדָ֣ם <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dam And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֔יק <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zik, repaired מְשֻׁלָּ֥ם <S%H4918><s%> me-shul-Lam Meshullam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son בֶּרֶכְיָ֖ה <S%H1296><s%> be-rech-Yah of Berechiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מְשֵׁיזַבְאֵ֑ל <S%H4898><s%> me-shei-zav-'El; of Meshezabeel ס sa-Mek וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and יָדָ֣ם <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dam And next unto them הֶֽחֱזִ֔יק <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zik, repaired צָד֖וֹק <S%H6659><s%> tza-Dok Zadok בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son בַּעֲנָֽא׃ <S%H1195><s%> ba-'a-Na. of Baana ס sa-Mek

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- unto יָדָ֖ם <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dam And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֣יקוּ <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zi-ku repaired הַתְּקוֹעִ֑ים <S%H8621><s%> hat-te-ko-'Im; the Tekoites וְאַדִּֽירֵיהֶם֙ <S%H117><s%> ve-'ad-di-rei-Hem but their nobles לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- not הֵבִ֣יאוּ <S%H935><s%> he-Vi-'u put צַוָּרָ֔ם <S%H6677><s%> tzav-va-Ram, not their necks בַּעֲבֹדַ֖ת <S%H5656><s%> ba-'a-vo-Dat to the work אֲדֹנֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-nei-Hem. of their Lord ס sa-Mek

וְאֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שַׁ֨עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar gate הַיְשָׁנָ֜ה <S%H3465><s%> hay-sha-Nah Moreover the old הֶחֱזִ֗יקוּ <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zi-ku, repaired יֽוֹיָדָע֙ <S%H3111><s%> yo-ya-Da' Jehoiada בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son פָּסֵ֔חַ <S%H6454><s%> pa-Se-ach, of Paseah וּמְשֻׁלָּ֖ם <S%H4918><s%> u-me-shul-Lam and Meshullam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son בְּסֽוֹדְיָ֑ה <S%H1152><s%> be-sod-Yah; of Besodeiah הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah they קֵר֔וּהוּ <S%H7136><s%> ke-Ru-hu, they laid the beams וַֽיַּעֲמִ֙ידוּ֙ <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'a-Mi-du thereof and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <S%H1817><s%> dal-to-Tav, the doors וּמַנְעֻלָ֖יו <S%H4514><s%> u-man-'u-Lav thereof and the locks וּבְרִיחָֽיו׃ <S%H1280><s%> u-ve-ri-Chav. thereof and the bars ס sa-Mek

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- unto יָדָ֨ם <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dam And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֜יק <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zik repaired מְלַטְיָ֣ה <S%H4424><s%> me-lat-Yah Melatiah הַגִּבְעֹנִ֗י <S%H1393><s%> hag-giv-'o-Ni, the Gibeonite וְיָדוֹן֙ <S%H3036><s%> ve-ya-dOn and Jadon הַמֵּרֹ֣נֹתִ֔י <S%H4824><s%> ham-me-Ro-no-Ti, the Meronothite אַנְשֵׁ֥י <S%H376><s%> 'an-Shei the men גִבְע֖וֹן <S%H1391><s%> giv-'on of Gibeon וְהַמִּצְפָּ֑ה <S%H4709><s%> ve-ham-mitz-Pah; and of Mizpah לְכִסֵּ֕א <S%H3678><s%> le-chis-Se unto the throne פַּחַ֖ת <S%H6346><s%> pa-Chat of the governor עֵ֥בֶר <S%H5676><s%> 'E-ver on this side הַנָּהָֽר׃ <S%H5104><s%> han-na-Har. the river ס sa-Mek

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto יָד֣וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do Next unto him הֶחֱזִ֗יק <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zik, repaired עֻזִּיאֵ֤ל <S%H5816><s%> 'uz-zi-'El Uzziel בֶּֽן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son חַרְהֲיָה֙ <S%H2736><s%> char-ha-Yah of Harhaiah צֽוֹרְפִ֔ים <S%H6884><s%> tzor-Fim, of the goldsmiths ס sa-Mek וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- unto יָד֣וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do Next unto him הֶחֱזִ֔יק <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zik, also repaired חֲנַנְיָ֖ה <S%H2608><s%> cha-nan-Yah Hananiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son הָרַקָּחִ֑ים <S%H7546><s%> ha-rak-ka-Chim; of [one of] the apothecaries וַיַּֽעַזְבוּ֙ <S%H5800><s%> vai-ya-'az-Vu and they fortified יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-Ru-sha-Lim, Jerusalem עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad far הַחוֹמָ֥ה <S%H2346><s%> ha-cho-Mah wall הָרְחָבָֽה׃ <S%H7342><s%> ha-re-cha-Vah. unto the broad ס sa-Mek

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- Next יָדָ֤ם <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dam And next unto them הֶחֱזִיק֙ <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zik repaired רְפָיָ֣ה <S%H7509><s%> re-fa-Yah Rephaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son ח֔וּר <S%H2354><s%> Chur, of Hur שַׂ֕ר <S%H8269><s%> sar the ruler חֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> cha-Tzi of the half פֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H6418><s%> Pe-lech part יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim. of Jerusalem ס sa-Mek

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- unto יָדָ֧ם <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dam And next unto them הֶחֱזִ֛יק <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zik repaired יְדָיָ֥ה <S%H3042><s%> ye-da-Yah Jedaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son חֲרוּמַ֖ף <S%H2739><s%> cha-ru-Maf of Harumaph וְנֶ֣גֶד <S%H5048><s%> ve-Ne-ged opposite בֵּית֑וֹ <S%H1004><s%> bei-To; even over against his house ס sa-Mek וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- unto יָד֣וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do And next unto him הֶחֱזִ֔יק <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zik, repaired חַטּ֖וּשׁ <S%H2407><s%> chat-Tush Hattush בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son חֲשַׁבְנְיָֽה׃ <S%H2813><s%> cha-shav-ne-Yah. of Hashabniah

מִדָּ֣ה <S%H4060><s%> mid-Dah piece שֵׁנִ֗ית <S%H8145><s%> she-Nit, the other הֶחֱזִיק֙ <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zik repaired מַלְכִּיָּ֣ה <S%H4441><s%> mal-ki-Yah Malchijah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son חָרִ֔ם <S%H2766><s%> cha-Rim, of Harim וְחַשּׁ֖וּב <S%H2815><s%> ve-chash-Shuv and Hashub בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son פַּחַ֣ת pa-Chat מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H6355><s%> mo-'Av; of Pahathmoab וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מִגְדַּ֥ל <S%H4026><s%> mig-Dal and the tower הַתַּנּוּרִֽים׃ <S%H8574><s%> hat-tan-nu-Rim. of the furnaces ס sa-Mek

וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- Next יָד֣וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do And next unto him הֶחֱזִ֗יק <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zik, repaired שַׁלּוּם֙ <S%H7967><s%> shal-Lum Shallum בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son הַלּוֹחֵ֔שׁ <S%H3873><s%> hal-lo-Chesh, of Halohesh שַׂ֕ר <S%H8269><s%> sar the ruler חֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> cha-Tzi of the half פֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H6418><s%> Pe-lech part יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim; of Jerusalem ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he וּבְנוֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1323><s%> u-ve-no-Tav. he and his daughters ס sa-Mek

אֵת֩ <S%H853><s%> 'et שַׁ֨עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar gate הַגַּ֜יְא <S%H1516><s%> hag-Gay The valley הֶחֱזִ֣יק <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zik repaired חָנוּן֮ <S%H2586><s%> cha-Nun Hanun וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> ve-yo-she-Vei and the inhabitants זָנוֹחַ֒ <S%H2182><s%> za-no-aCh of Zanoah הֵ֣מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah They בָנ֔וּהוּ <S%H1129><s%> va-Nu-hu, they built וַֽיַּעֲמִ֙ידוּ֙ <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'a-Mi-du it and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <S%H1817><s%> dal-to-Tav, the doors מַנְעֻלָ֖יו <S%H4514><s%> man-'u-Lav thereof the locks וּבְרִיחָ֑יו <S%H1280><s%> u-ve-ri-Chav; thereof and the bars וְאֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> ve-'E-lef thereof and a thousand אַמָּה֙ <S%H520><s%> 'am-Mah cubits בַּחוֹמָ֔ה <S%H2346><s%> ba-cho-Mah, on the wall עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> 'ad against שַׁ֥עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar gate הָשֲׁפֽוֹת׃ <S%H830><s%> ha-sha-Fot. unto the dung

וְאֵ֣ת׀ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar gate הָאַשְׁפּ֗וֹת <S%H830><s%> ha-'ash-Pot, But the dung הֶחֱזִיק֙ <S%H2388><s%> he-che-Zik repaired מַלְכִּיָּ֣ה <S%H4441><s%> mal-ki-Yah Malchiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son רֵכָ֔ב <S%H7394><s%> re-Chav, of Rechab שַׂ֖ר <S%H8269><s%> sar the ruler פֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H6418><s%> Pe-lech of part בֵּית־ beit- הַכָּ֑רֶם <S%H1021><s%> hak-Ka-rem; of Bethhaccerem ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu He יִבְנֶ֔נּוּ <S%H1129><s%> yiv-Nen-nu, he built וְיַעֲמִיד֙ <S%H5975><s%> ve-ya-'a-Mid it and set up דַּלְתֹתָ֔יו <S%H1817><s%> dal-to-Tav, the doors מַנְעֻלָ֖יו <S%H4514><s%> man-'u-Lav thereof the locks וּבְרִיחָֽיו׃ <S%H1280><s%> u-ve-ri-Chav. thereof and the bars ס sa-Mek
